name: Atlantis III: The New World
description:
Step back into the land of dreams and legends...

Embark on an incredible adventure and become immersed in an extraordinary tale of intrigue and mystery.

Assume the role of an archaeologist, as you search for the existence of a metropolis built, according to myth and legend, by the ancient Egyptians. Your quest for the mysterious secrets, that have eluded many, will take you on a journey through worlds of unequaled beauty.

Let wisdom be your guide as you travel through time and spirit, and encounter challenging puzzles along your path. Discover and explore the stunning surroundings of the vast Sahara Desert, the wondrous icy plains of Syberia, and the fascinating lands of ancient Egypt.

The greatest treasure of all time lies waiting to be discovered.

Main features:
* An epic adventure set across many worlds
* Stunningly realistic 3D graphics
* Original and compelling storyline
